stat_url_day.map: function(doc) { if(doc.type === 'stat' && doc.userAgent && (new Date().getTime() - new Date(doc.date.replace(/T.*Z/g, '').replace(/-/g, '/')).getTime() < 86400000) && !doc.userAgent.match(/(Googlebot|Yahoo! Slurp|OneRiot|mxbot|Python-urllib|MetaURI API|TweetmemeBot|ellerdale.com|topsy.com|Baidu|NjuiceBot)/)) { emit(doc.url, 1); } }
